item.title: After Marvel's Major Cast Announcement, I'm Even More Confident In My Biggest Doomsday Theory
item.description: The MCU's major cast announcement for Avengers: Doomsday has helped cement one of my biggest theories for the upcoming crossover's actual conflict.

item.title: Avengers: Doomsday's Cast Only Includes 1 Actor From The MCU's Past Two Movies To Earn More Than $1B - And It's The Last Actor I Would've Expected
item.description: Marvel is gearing up for a huge crossover event to take place in Avengers: Doomsday, but there are still a lot of major characters missing.

item.title: Over 500 Oscar Voters Criticize Academy For Not Supporting No Other Land Director Hamdan Ballal
item.description: Over 500 members of the Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Sciences are responding to a statement about Hamdan Ballal's capture by Israeli soldiers.
